scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run start:dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix backend run build
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix backend && npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.db:init: npm --prefix backend run migration:run && npm --prefix backend run seed
